title: [Schoolhouse, Lunchroom]
description: An arch inset in the southern wall leads back to the hallway.  Wooden benches and tables are placed all over the large room and bits of food and parchment litter the floor underneath the benches.

An arch inset in the southern wall leads back to the relative silence of the hallway.  Wooden benches and tables are placed all over the large room and dozens of children sit gossiping about the daily activities while eating their meals.  Bits of food and parchment litter the floor underneath the benches.
